  • Method Details

    • create

      static Human create(org.bukkit.Location location)
      Static access to creating NPC.
      Parameters:
      location - - Location to create at.

    • create

      static Human create(org.bukkit.Location location, String name)
      Static access to creating NPC.
      Parameters:
      location - - Location to create at.
      name - - NPC name. Leave blank for empty name, or null for CLICK name.

    • create

      static Human create(org.bukkit.Location location, String name, String skin)
      Static access to creating NPC.
      Parameters:
      location - - Location to create at.
      name - - NPC name. Leave blank for empty name, or null for CLICK name.
      skin - - Skin owner username.

    • setShaking

      void setShaking(boolean shaking)
      Set if NPC is shaking of cold.
      Parameters:
      shaking - - Enable or disable shaking.

      boolean isShaking()
      Returns true if NPC is shaking of cold.
      Returns:
      true if NPC is shaking of cold.

    • isPersistent

      boolean isPersistent()
      Returns true if NPC is persistent, false otherwise. Persistent NPC's will not be removed when far away.
      Returns:
      true if NPC is persistent, false otherwise.

    • setPersistent

      void setPersistent(boolean persistent)
      Sets if NPC should be persistent. Persistent NPC's will not be removed when far away.
      Parameters:
      persistent - - Enable or disable persistence.

    • getFarAwayDist

      int getFarAwayDist()
      Returns maximum distance from NPC's location where it's rendered. Note that is isPersistent() this will be ignored.
      Returns:
      maximum distance from NPC's location where it's rendered.

    • setFarAwayDist

      HumanNPC setFarAwayDist(int farAwayDist)
      Changes maximum distance from NPC's location where it's rendered. Note that is isPersistent() this will be ignored.
      Parameters:
      farAwayDist - - New distance.

      Parameters:

      signature - - Signature.

    • setGhostItem

      void setGhostItem(ItemSlot slot, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, @Nullable org.bukkit.entity.Player... players)
      Ignores NPC's equipment and sends a "ghost" item to provided players. updateEquipment() will reset NPC's "ghost" equipment.
      Parameters:
      slot - - Slot to put items on.
      item - - Item.
      players - - Players who will see the change.

    • setItem

      void setItem(ItemSlot slot, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
      Changed actual equipment of the NPC, which is the same for every player.
      Parameters:
      slot - - Slot to put items on.
      item - - Item.

    • updateEquipment

      void updateEquipment()
      Updates NPC's equipment and shows it to players.

    • showAll

      void showAll()
      Shows NPC to all online players.

    • show

      void show(@Nonnull org.bukkit.entity.Player... players)
      Shows this NPC to players.
      Parameters:
      players - - Players who NPC will be shown to.

      void reloadNpcData()

      void hideTabListName()
      Hides this NPC's name. NPC's name is actually a HumanNPC.getHexName().

      Plays provided animation to players.
      Parameters:
      animation - - Animation to play.

    • updateDataWatcher

      void updateDataWatcher()
      Updates NPC's DataWatcher. Used after calling HumanNPC.setDataWatcherByteValue(int, byte)

      Completely removes NPC.

      Parameters:
